basic.description: This course covers algebra and geometry of complex numbers; elementary functions and their mappings. Analytic functions; integration in the complex plane; Cauchy's integral theorem and related theorems. Representation theorems including the Taylor and Laurent expansions. Calculus of residues. Entire and meromorphic functions.
basic.subject: MAA
basic.title: Theory of Functions of a Complex Variable I

extra.enrollment_requirement: Prerequisite: MAA 4227 or MAA 5307; or MAA 4226 and MAA 4402.
